EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Standard Template - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Bret, I would love to speak with you abou this, espcially since you are an MBO alumni! You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. I look forward to connecting. Take care, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Bret Smith - High-Impact-Prospecting, LLC [mailto:bret@high-impact-prospecting.com] Sent: Thursday, November 01, 2012 3:41 PM To: info Cc: Steve Kirschner - High-Impact-Prospecting, LLC Subject: RE: Why deal with the high fixed cost of business insurance? Tell us more! Thanks, Bret Bret Smith, Managing PrincipalHigh-Impact-Prospecting, LLC90 State Street, Suite 700Albany, NY 12207 bret@high-impact-prospecting.com <mailto:bret@high-impact-prospecting.com> MAIN 518.591.4665DIRECT 518.512.0775 Join the H-I-P LinkedIn group <http://www.linkedin.com/groups/High-Impact-eProspecting-eMarketing-3787724?home=&gid=3787724&trk=anet_ug_hm>Download the H-I-P PDF @ http://www.high-impact-prospecting.com/docs/High-Impact-Prospecting_v15.pdf <http://www.high-impact-prospecting.com/docs/High-Impact-Prospecting_v15.pdf>On facebook @ http://www.facebook.com/HighImpactProspecting <http://www.facebook.com/HighImpactProspecting> From: MBO Partners [mailto:info@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Thursday, November 01, 2012 3:40 PM To: Bret Smith - High-Impact-Prospecting, LLC Subject: Why deal with the high fixed cost of business insurance? Spending time researching independent business insurance and balking at the high fixed cost and coverage hassles? Run your business through MBO Partners, so you can conveniently pay as you go under our blanket coverage policies. Since you only pay for what you need when you need it, its easy for you to fulfill client insurance requirements and get billing.
